scripts.prebuildLayer: cd lambdaLayerStack && npm i && cd .. && npm run moveLibsToLayer
scripts.deploy: npm run buildLayer && npm run package
scripts.postdeploy: sam deploy --template-file ./packaged.yaml --region <REGION> --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM CAPABILITY_AUTO_EXPAND --stack-name khelApp-stack --s3-bucket <Bucket_name> --parameter-overrides stageName=prod
